_description: Verses translating ‘Viuimus hic sorte, noli spem ponere morte’ which precedes it — one quatrain in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Alle we liuen hapfulicheNo man ne trost wan he sal
                    deyȝeÞerfore ne tak nouth wrongfulicheFor peraunter to-morwe
                    þu gost þi weye
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 26.
